```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}

# Load map sources
# Shape files and data
# ++++++++++++++++++++
# state_boundaries
# county
# abeyi
# ++++++++++++++++++++
# hotosm_ssd_waterways_lines_shp
# hotosm_ssd_waterways_polygons_shp
# ssd_lakes_and_marshland_fao_500k
# ssd_main_rivers_fao_250k
# ssd_waterpoints_wims_2012
# ++++++++++++++++++++

# Borders
state_boundaries <- st_read("map-sources/geojson/ss-state.geojson")
county <- st_read("map-sources/geojson/ss-county.geojson")
abeyi <- st_read("map-sources/geojson/ss-abeyi.geojson")


# hotosm_ssd_waterways_lines_shp
waterways_lines <- st_read("map-sources/physical/hotosm_ssd_waterways_lines_shp/hotosm_ssd_waterways_lines.shp")

# hotosm_ssd_waterways_polygons_shp
waterways_polygons <- st_read("map-sources/physical/hotosm_ssd_waterways_polygons_shp/hotosm_ssd_waterways_polygons.shp")

# ssd_lakes_and_marshland_fao_500k
lakes_and_marshland <- st_read("map-sources/physical/ssd_lakes_and_marshland_fao_500k/ssd_Lakes_and_marshland_fao_500k.shp")

# ssd_main_rivers_fao_250k
main_rivers <- st_read("map-sources/physical/ssd_main_rivers_fao_250k/ssd_main_rivers_fao_250k.shp")

# ssd_waterpoints_wims_2012
waterpoints <- st_read("map-sources/physical/ssd_waterpoints_wims_2012/SSd_Waterpoints_WIMS_2012.shp")

head(as.data.frame(waterways_lines))
head(as.data.frame(waterways_polygons))
head(as.data.frame(lakes_and_marshland))
head(as.data.frame(main_rivers))
head(as.data.frame(waterpoints))

wpts <- as.data.frame(unique(waterpoints$Source_Typ))
wpts
borehole <- waterpoints %>% filter(Source_Typ=="Borehole")
as.data.frame(borehole)

```



```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.width=12, fig.height=12, out.width = "100%"}

# Plot by layer
# adm0, adm1, adm2

# theme parameters
theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  # panel.background = element_blank(),
  panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#ffffff"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  # plot.background = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#ffffff")
)

transparent_fill <- rgb(0, 0, 0, max = 255, alpha = 0, names = "transparent")

# In order of layer placement top -> down
v1 = ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = waterpoints, color="#CAD0D8", fill = "#CAD0D8", size=0.3) +
  geom_sf(data = lakes_and_marshland, color="#aad0a7", fill = "#aad0a7", size=0.3) +
  geom_sf(data = main_rivers, color="#d4f1f9", fill = "#d4f1f9", size=0.3) +
  geom_sf(data = waterways_polygons, color="#d4f1f9", fill = "#d4f1f9", size=0.3) +
  geom_sf(data = waterways_lines, color="#d4f1f9", fill = "#d4f1f9", size=0.3) +
  geom_sf(data = state_boundaries, color="#333333", fill = transparent_fill, size=1.0) +
  geom_sf(data = county, color="#333333", fill = transparent_fill, size=0.5) +
  geom_sf(data = abeyi, color="#333333", fill = transparent_fill, size=0.5, linetype = "dashed") +
  scale_x_continuous() +
  scale_y_continuous() +
  coord_sf() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = NULL, # Longitude
       y = NULL, # Latitude
       title = NULL, 
       subtitle = NULL) +
  theme_opts

# v1

girafe( ggobj = v1, width_svg = 12, height_svg = 8, options = list( opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9) ))

```



```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

ggsave(filename = "assets/2-ssd-physical.svg", plot = v1, width=12, height=12)

```
